      • getExpireDate

        public long getExpireDate()
        Gets the expired time
        Returns:
        -1 or expired value, if the password is no longer valid 0 if the password is valid

      • setExpireDate

        public void setExpireDate(long expireDate)
        Sets the expired time
        Parameters:
        expireDate -

      • getPwState

        public LoginPermission.PWSTATE getPwState()
        Gets the duration of the password
        Returns:
        CHANGEPW - if the Operator have to change his password DEFAULT - if the duration is bigger than actual time OUTOFDATE - if the duration is expired

      • setPwState

        public void setPwState(LoginPermission.PWSTATE pwState)
        Sets the duration of the password
        Parameters:

        public void setDeniedTime(int deniedTime)
        Sets the denied time (seconds)
        Parameters:
        deniedTime - in seconds

      • isLoginDenied

        public boolean isLoginDenied()
        If the denied time is not 0, the operator is not able to log in in Mediatrix. Or if the denied time is -1, the operator is no longer active and a permitted Operator has to reactive them
        Returns:
        true if the operator is permitted to login otherwise false.
